Name: 执剑九霄
About the game: The game is made with RPGmaker MV software and uses the drill + MOG plug-in (thanks to the maker of the plug-in). It is a turn based role-playing game in the style of Chinese immortal Xia. The first one is the [Zhongxuan chapter] of 'holding the sword in the sky', which mainly tells about Li mu, a junior brother of the Tianjian sect in Zhongxuan Prefecture who has just started. He was ordered by his teacher to experience in the world of mortals and heard it in Zhongxuan Prefecture, Seeing all kinds of strange people and strange things, he also unknowingly became the witness of an amazing conspiracy. Zhongxuan chapter will be the beginning of the whole story, which may be a little boring. However, as a game development enthusiast, he doesn't understand the program, but in terms of enthusiasm, please believe that jiuxiao with sword will gradually develop and open with the version, Present a better side to gamers. Players can experience three classes (fairy sword, crazy sword and magic sword) in the game. Each class has its own characteristics. At the same time, it is also equipped with different growth routes, storylines and game experience.
